home-page.title: Data Analysis as a Service
home-page.explore-description: Explore and visualise your data. Select and pre-process data to pull in to your analysis environment.
home-page.analyse-description: Connect to a virtual environment already equipped with the software and tools to analyse your data.
home-page.record-description: Store your results and findings, making them available to others for review and further research.
home-page.banner-one: transforming the use of real time data processing, computer simulation and data analytics...
home-page.banner-two: ...to deliver more effective research at our national facilities
